review_text: It was very nice to have several different units that our large family could be close together!
Thank you to Destiny for allowing us to stay in her place, it made it easy to be close by for graduation.
Stayed here several times, always great.
Highly recommend.
always fits our needs and is quite.
We met my parents and daughter there for the weekend. Each of us traveling several hours to get there. It was a great place to reconnect. The kitchen was well stocked and we enjoyed it very much.
We stay here every year to Celebrate Christmas with family who live nearby .
Great location!
Excellent place , will stay again. Destiny was easy to work with , answered questions prior to arrival, reached out during our stay to make sure we didn’t need anything. Great experience.
I try to stay here every time I’m in Mitchell. That’s of course if it’s not booked up.
Great place to stay. Comfortable beds. Easy to find. Our van and 12 foot cargo trailer that we were pulling while moving across the country fit in the driveway well. Highly recommended.
Great place. Convenient location.

This is the third time we have stayed with Destiny when we come to Mitchell to visit family. The townhome is very spacious an can accommodate our family well. It is equipped with basic amenities for food preparation and is located in a safe family neighborhood.
Destiny's place far exceeded my expectations. I only wish we had stayed there longer. There was plenty of room and everything was very clean.

Three bedrooms worked great for the family to attend a graduation. We didn’t spend much time in Mitchell but the townhouse was exactly like it was described. It was great to use the kitchen to make a couple meals. The neighborhood was quiet and we slept well.
She was great to work with the place was perfect for our stay and we were happy with everything.
Worked great for our weekend.

We arrived late in the am to check in and the code failed to work . We called Destiny and she gave us a different code and we were able to get inside . We have stayed here a few times and it’s perfect for what we need .
Third time staying at this location and have always been happy! Thanks for another great stay!
Awesome to work with!

Quiet, clean, comfortable and easy to find. Destiny is easy to communicate with and I would definitely stay here again. You'll have no issues choosing this spot! Oh and the internet is crazy fast! Thanks Destiny!
We enjoyed our stay very much! Our hosts were great!
comfortable with alot of room.
Have stayed in one of Destiny's places before and enjoyed it the second time around!
Great location, spacious, wonderful for a group of hunters!
The stay was great. Cleanly, accurate description, quiet neighborhood. Would and will recommend to anyone and plan to check for availability if we ever stay in Mitchell again.
The place we very clean and we really enjoyed staying there. We will always stay here when we travel to the area.
Very nice place to stay. Destiny was a good host. Answered our questions timely

Perfect location. Quiet.
Lots of room and rooms!
Loved having a garage. And patio.
Great location and value. 2nd stay here in about a year. Planning on another trip here next year.
Perfect place for our family to stay! We rented 2 units and were happy they were right next to each other! Very clean and felt like home for the weekend. We’ll definitely rent from Destiny again!
The townhouse was as described and very functional. We found it to be very centrally located and it was so nice being able to use the garage. We would stay again if we find ourselves in the area.
Multiple families rented 4 units side by side for a family reunion - great location, clean and excellent price. Will definitely rent again! Thanks!
really nice town house
The place was wonderful! Destiny was very responsive to any questions or concerns I had and handled things in a timely manner. The condo was clean and quiet. We had a great time. Thank you!
This was a great place for our family to stay. Lots of room, easy to find, it was nice to have a garage to park in since we had bikes on the back of the car.
Great stopover spot along I-90! Very updated and clean, and plenty of beds. Worked great for my family of 6. Has everything you could need.
A good value in an easy to access part of Mitchell. Clean, spacious, and well furnished.
Clean!! Great Hosts!! Secure!! Will use again!!
Great place! Very clean and hosts were wonderful to work with! Would definitely stay again!!
As advertised. Clean, comfy and perfect

We were only passing through and stayed one night, but found this townhouse to be a great stay! It was clean, had a ton of beds, check in couldn’t have been easier, and everything was as it was advertised. We would definitely stay here again!

This condo is so clean. Very roomy. Lots of beds and with 2 1/2 baths you couldn’t ask for better. The beds are so comfortable. It is in a great location and the hosts were great. I highly recommend this. My family and I loved it.

Lovely town house! It’s very quiet and lots of room for privacy or quiet time. So nice to pull into the garage & unload & park in on cold days.
The Master bed is a Serta and was so comfy! The Bed spreads we soo soft and pretty. The 3 bathrooms were so amazing! The showers had great water pressure!!
The decor in the entire place is very calming. The Kitchen is fully stocked with cook wear & dishes.
We’ll definitely rent again!!
Always great! Easy communication with hosts, quiet location with everything you need for a stay, and tons of space.

A wonderful home with lots of space and many beds for a large group. Three bathrooms and a large kitchen area make it very easy for a large group to comfortably stay here. We loved it and will hopefully be back in the summer time. Thank you.

I have stayed here a few times and I would recommend it . Great location , super clean and communication is excellent . Rules are listed so you know what to expect . Everything you need for a great stay !

My husband and I come to Mitchell every year for a little get away and hunting. This year we were joined with friends. We decided to stay in your AB and it did not disappoint! We will make sure to stay at this location again. Destiny and Micaela provided excellent customer service and your communication was fast! They helped make our trip stress free. We highly recommend groups coming from out of town staying at this location. It has everything you will need for longer stays!
Great place! Home away from home!
Best place in Mitchell! Perfect stay for us! Clean, great location and exactly as described. Will definitely stay again next time we are in the area. Highly recommended!

This turned out to be the perfect place for my family to spend Thanksgiving week! Just right for our family of 4, as each teenager had their own room, but with a total of 7 beds would be great for a larger group, too. Dining/family area had plenty of room to accommodate our 5 extra guests for Thanksgiving dinner as well. Clean and comfortable, convenient location, plus timely and responsive communication with hosts, will definitely have us seeking out this space for our next trip to Mitchell!
Everything was perfect. I’ll definitely stay again.
great beds and and location
Best place in Mitchell to stay!... Beautiful decor, comfortable beds and full kitchen to cook meals!..

Well configured space for our family of eight with enough beds and rooms to keep everyone happy. Well stocked kitchen had enough equipment to make meals and enough space for everyone to eat in comfort.
Very clean and stocked for the family. I was very pleased with the accommodations and how clean the property is. We will stay here every time we visit Mitchell.
Great place and lots of room.
Great place to stay! Enough room for the 5 that were in my group.
Very well-maintained and appointed condo with all the amenities. While the street itself isn't the nicest, the proximity to restaurants, gas stations, and other facilities makes it a good location.
Easy place to stay during cross country trip.

My family stayed for two nights at the end of a long road trip and it was a perfect end location for us. The townhouse was wonderful- lots of space, comfy beds and pillows, very clean! Simple check in/out- Destiny was prompt answering any questions that came up-even at the last minute. I would definitely stay again!
Very clean, very spacious as well!
It was clean and beautiful.Destiny is a helpful host.

Destiny quickly responded to questions and particular personal need requests. Nicely appointed decorating and well supplied kitchen that made us feel right at home. We would not hesitate to stay there again!
Great place!
This was a great place to stay... clean and lots of space!
Very comfortable stay. Better than the hotels.
Great location, nice and clean, and comfortable. I would stay here again.
This place is so nice!!!!!!!! everything was easy to get to, the beds are comfy and we had everything we needed! I plan to stay here again easy!
Great location. Nice place with lots of sleeping spaces. Great living room.
Place is very nice we stayed in unit 2. Destiny was wonderful host to deal with.
Would rent again
This place was great! Spacious and perfect for a group.

We were a group of 7 in the area for work. This property worked out well for us. The layout was good and we appreciated all the bathrooms. The host was very accommodating of our late checkout request.
Plenty of space in this clean, modern apartment! Our child loved having his pick of beds in one of the smaller bedrooms (they are all big!) and his own bathroom!

The townhome is amazing! Having a garage space was WAY more helpful than we thought that it'd be, and the place was WAY larger than we expected. All of the appliances looked and acted brand new, and the beds, pillows, and blankets were all exceptionally comfortable! Plus it's exceptionally well located next to all sorts of great food!
And there was a small back area where we could let our dogs out quickly, and plenty of places nearby to walk the dogs.
We were extremely happy with our stay!

Spacious new town home equipped with everything to make you feel at home away from home! Very clean and comfortable. It was fantastic that we could travel with our dog and have a great space to enjoy family. Definitely recommend!
The perfect place. Every detail was on point. So comfortable. Would absolutely stay again.
Great Communication and the stay was excellent! Would stay again.
Had a great stay! Owner met us at the door. Place was clean and fit description provided.
Everything you need for a great stay in Mitchell, had a very minor question, but Destiny responded rapidly and cleared it up.
Neat and clean place with a fun vintage vibe downtown Mitchell.

The apartment is exactly what I expected and looks just as good in person as the pics. It’s very spacious and each bedroom is quite private. The building is older and seems to be transitioning as not all of it appeared as updated as the apartment. But it was quiet and peaceful. Great price for the size and layout of the space.
We were only there for a quick overnight so can’t say much about the town.

We enjoyed our stay at Anthony's. The space was very cute and the location was great. There is currently some construction on the road near the overnight parking. We hadn't read back to the reviews about the coffee shop music. The music will wake you up around 6:30 am. The coffee shop is very nice and has great breakfast options.

Really enjoyed our stay! Just a couple of blocks from the Corn Palace in downtown Mitchell. The apartment was much bigger than I had anticipated. Downtown Mitchell is quiet in the evenings. The place was very clean. There is a nice coffee shop one floor below.
Loved the Corn Palace , the Ptedistoric Native American excavations and the historic Depit. Also went to the Dakota Discovery Meseum.

We really enjoyed staying here. The apartment is very cute and has lots of character, and it was comfortable. Check-in was easy, and Anthony graciously offered to give us a late check-out, which was incredibly helpful. The location is the best part--it's in downtown Mitchell and close to everything. Being right on top of a coffee shop was very fun too (even though it was closed when we were there). The only thing I'd caution is that there are some steep stairs to get to the apartment; they were a little hard for my 77-year-old mother, but she managed. I would stay here again!

Anthony was very responsive and helpful (especially when I encountered a parking issue). The place is huge, comfy, cozy, well-appointed and charming. And two blocks away from the Corn Palace. Loved it!
Great Place! Ideal location for walking to restaurants and Bars. Solid Vibes and Comfortable Place!

We had a great time here. Even with the blizzard we had to outrun to get to Mitchell. Anthony was very accommodating and responsive. We didn’t have a contingency plan when the snow hit so arrived a few hours early. The place is rustically decorated in the perfect way. The trickiest part was figuring out what to do with the car when the plows came through, but that was minor and short lived. We would 100% rent here again.
We really enjoyed our stay! Had everything we needed. The coffee shop below was an added bonus! Thanks Anthony!
place felt cozy and greatly decorated! very friendly and responsive. thank you for the stay!
cute central location... steep stairs. Parking around the corner is a PITA when it is cold out. nice place overall and worth the cost.
Would stay again
The place was rustically adorable and the location perfect for exploring🐾
Great stay, would happily come back
Only spent one night but this is perfect if you’re visiting the corn palace! Anthony is very kind !

The location of the property was GREAT! Lots of items in the apartment that were interesting to look at. The chess board and pick up stick games were perfect for my kiddos. There was a blow up mattress that worked out good for my 2 year old. Overall I was quite impressed with the apartment and was a much more affordable option for my family.
Cozy and cute apartment. Loved this little getway!
The apartment was comfy and cozy. The kitchen and bathroom was well stocked in cookware and extra linens. I felt at home and welcomed in the space!
We love this place. This is the fourth or fifth time that we’ve stayed there. So cozy. So nicely decorated. It has everything we want and more.
Anthony’s place was delightful. It made a great home base while we visited with family.

Loved staying here! The apartment was clean and peaceful. I loved waking up to the sound of the coffee shop below. I also enjoyed how they kept the old charm. Very comfy beds and furniture.
The only downside was that it was around 60° in the apartment even with the heat on. I know it's because this is an older place and it was -40° outside, but I still froze! Regardless, I travel to Mitchell off often and will stay here again. Next time I'll just bring my heated blanket :-)
Loved our stay!!! Comfortable bed. Cozy apartment. Will stay again!
We had a great stay here! The apartment was roomy and comfortable with interesting decor and good vibes 😊
Great location and very cute little place
Great place in the heart of town.

Another great stay....second time here in last two years. Great location in the center of town with many walkable restaurants and bars. Great apartment with everything you could possibly need. I'll be back!
Nice place. Comfortable stay. Would definitely recommend.
Love this place. So cute and comfortable. Great beds. Walkable - 100 percent. This is our third stay here. Perfect!

Anthony’s apartment was perfect for my stay. I brought my dog and it was comfy for both of us. The space has clearly been updated and is welcoming and well stocked. Comfy bed, great furniture, all around a great place to stay.
Coffee shop just below was a bonus!

Anthony’s apartment is a great place! Really clean and well maintained. Within walking distance of the local small businesses and restaurants. Great location if you need to visit the Corn Palace several times! Highly recommend this beautiful apartment!

Anthony’s place is quaint, very well set up, and was exactly what we were looking for. We had a quiet evening, and the place was very comfortable. The collection of antiques and knickknacks created a very cool vibe.

We came to Mitchell to celebrate a birthday with an elderly relative. This vintage apartment offered the perfect place to stay--close to everything in Mitchell and yet peaceful. It is a very comfortable stay.

Went up for pheasant hunt and Mitchell and wanted to stay somewhere besides hotel room. Found Anthony's place and was perfect for two hunters, clean comfortable well appointed with amenities as well as lots of extra stuff placed in the kitchen made it feel very much at home. Located in historic building on Main Street Mitchell it was conveniently located to corn palace, restaurants, sports bars, and other shopping in the downtown area and of course coffee shop directly below apartment. Even though on main street, it was not noisy at all. Will definitely book again next year and highly recommend anyone traveling to Mitchell to give it a try
Great place to stay!
Would stay again.
It was a great stay, he’s very responsive and great to work with!!!
It had a real homey feel like Grandma’s house and it was comforting. It had a big bath and hot water which felt nice after traveling.
Excellent place to stay on Main Street. They home was quiet and easy to find. This is our second visit to Anthony’s place, we will be back!
Beautifully decorated, clean, great view, and had everything we needed.

Wonderful place - much larger than it looked in the photos. The internet is a little slow so keep that in mind if you’re working. Nevertheless, a wonderful stay - very convenient walkable neighborhood with street parking right next door.
Really nice linens and a good hot shower. Would be a great place for someone in need of a longer term stay.

Anthony's place is in a brilliant Mitchell location. Walkable to all attractions and above an excellent coffee shop. The rental itself is peaceful and private. It had everything we needed, including comfortable beds. We loved the mix of antique and industrial.
At first glance you gotta think OH NO! The stairs and hallway are something right outta Compton. But once you actually enter the apartment is is GORGEOUS!
This was such a great place to stay for visiting Corn Palace!

We really enjoyed our stay at Anthony's. It is very quaint and nicely decorated in fun antiques. It is a bit of a climb to get to, so I would recommend for younger people or very fit older people. It does have a bit of a musty smell, but it is an older building. He gave very good checkout instructions. and we truly enjoyed our stay.
This place is unique and quiet. It's a great place to stay while passing through on a road trip.
Didn’t stay. Looked apartment over. Opted out.
Great place to land! Wonderfully decorated and appointed! In a great location on Main Street!

Great location right in the heart of town! My husband and I are very picky about the cleanliness of places and this place exceeded our expectations. Everything you may need during your stay was available. We visited during the SD state fair and this was ideally located for us driving back and forth to Huron. Very walkable and would stay again!
Very nice space! Comfy and great location, all the comforts of home and worked great for my work trip.
Great stay! Highly recommend!
This was the perfect spot for our road trip layover. Walked to the corn palace and enjoyed small town for a while. Plus the space was charming!
Great place to stay, very comfortable. Clean and cute. Walking distance to the Corn Palace!
this place is awesome, absolutely would stay again!

Enjoyed our stay at Anthony’s place with our family of five as we passed through Mitchelll on the way to the black hills of SD. One of my favorite features of this space was that it was located above a lovely coffee shop with an amazing breakfast! It was also within walking distance of several excellent local establishments for dinner!
This is our second time staying here, and it was great as always! The apartment was clean and close to the Corn Palace. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Anthony’s place is warm, nostalgic, and very inviting. The bathroom is beautiful and the beds are comfortable. We would definitely return.
Great place for our overnight stay. Wished we had a little more time to enjoy the apartment, and local area. Would definitely stay here again.

Anthony’s place was lovely! Great location - super close to the Corn Palace and fun shopping all within walking distance. The bed was very comfortable, and the big soaker tub was a relaxing way to end my long day of travel. We will definitely be back to shop more at Einstein’s across the road!
Cute place and a great location.

Anthony was great host. My son and I really liked Anthony’s place. An older apartment right above a downtown coffee shop. Clean, comfortable and very cool with a music theme. Would definitely recommend.
Nice location, interesting shops and comfortable stay. Building is quite old, but I like that so it was a good fit! Cafe below has good service and delicious food and drinks.
Such a cute quaint place, there was a Pre Sturgis event going on so we walked around and checked it out….great location.

Anthony's Mitchell AirBnB was great! The interior was clean and we loved the decor (very professional). Understand there is bit of a musty smell from some of the original flooring/building but they were thoughtful in providing a room spray that smells AMAZING (this did not diminish the experience of our stay- but is something to consider for those with smell sensitivities). The coffee shop below the apartment was an added bonus with delicious breakfast and coffee. Overall amazing stay, would definitely book again if we're in the area.
This is a great place, I wish we could have stayed longer!
Pleasant stay; interesting antiques, "retro" decor. I plan on booking again as I visit Mitchell off and on. Thanks Anthony.
Amazing place! Perfect location in downtown Mitchell! Loved this place and everything about it! The decor was so well done and fit the place nicely.

Nice, quiet location. The downtown streets were quiet at night so no noise. Apartment is nicely decorated, has character. Enjoyed the short walk to restaurants and the Corn Palace. Would stay here again.

I have been coming to Deadwood for 16 years…always stayed on a hotel. This year, a girls trip, we booked this cabin and couldn’t be more happier. Our cabin is clean, so roomy and we love the private deck with a gas fire pit. We are booking already for next year.

Anthony's place is a mix of modern convenience and historic charm. The wood floors and the antiques add interest, while the updated bathroom avoids the quirks of some older properties. The location couldn't be better. It's just steps away from the Corn Palace and close to restaurants.

What a neat apartment. Loved being able to walk down to the coffee shop below. The apartment has so much character and is right on Main Street. Clean, comfortable and perfect for a stop on our road trip!

Very large staircase. Not for people who are elderly with mobility issues or disabled. Very strong odor in the unit (musty) due to the age of the building. People with allergies like me may not do well with the smell. Clean and nicely decorated. Amenities are sufficient. I would say the price is high for what you get. Host never sent a personal message during our stay. All directions came from the site. They do ask you to get a load of laundry ready if you use towels which is unusual for Airbnbs as a whole as you pay a cleaning fee.
Clean, comfortable spot full of character. Nicely decorated and great location in downtown Mitchell.

One of my favorite Air B/Bs! Just a fabulous place - comfortable, roomy, quiet, great location. Such a unique place! I can't imagine why anyone would spend the same amount of money to stay at some hotel room on the interstate when they could have a place like this - two private bedrooms, great bathroom, fantastic living and dining room, full kitchen. Decoration was adorable and charming - whole place was charming! I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
The place was very clean, beautiful decor. Anthony was very helpful with late checkout. Definitely recommended.
Very cool place to stay! It was 2 blocks from the Corn Palace. We stayed there en route from Kansas City to the Black Hills. It was clean and very convenient. Would stay again .
Cute place right down the street from the corn palace!

The apartment was beautiful. It was very clean, beds were squeaky but very comfy, and lovely sheets! I did pick this particular place bc of a washer and dryer, we are on a cross country trip, and the washer was not working.
The hallway to the apt was quite sketchy.
This is our first AirBNB stay, very happy with the experience!
Great stay. Walkable to shops and restaurants. Clean and just what I was looking for.
Great place and GREAT location! Space was clean and had everything we needed! Beds were very comfortable, plenty of extra bedding and towels. Highly recommend!

What a gem in Mitchell, SD! The apartment offers more than the pictures and description suggest - cozy, comfy beds in nice-sized bedrooms, fully stocked kitchen, great living room and dining spaces - spacious bathroom... remote working spots galore (office, dining table, couch...) easy to access and in walking distance to many attractions/restaurants/cafes! Off street parking was easy. Driving to El Columpio on the edge of town for dinner was a breeze -- and seriously delicious burritos (I live in Chicago, where there are hundreds of Mexican restaurants... and am now dreaming of El Columpio, wishing it had an outpost in my town...!). Would DEFINITELY stay again!

One of our favorite places we’ve stayed so far. The building is older but the decor made us feel right at home. Kitchen was well stocked as well as plenty of extra linens & towels provided. The coffee shop below was perfect for breakfast the next morning before checkout. We would definitely stay there again
Decent place for an overnight stay
We enjoy our stay here. Nice, clean, and decorated very well. Thanks for the great stay, definitely would recommend for anyone wanting to checkout downtown Mitchell.

My kids and I loved staying at Anthony’s Airbnb. It was very easy to find, Anthony carefully explained check in details and the apt was super walkable. The beds were very comfortable— I slept 9 hours—no joke!
We walked to the Corn Palace, The Back 40 Taphouse Grill (delic burgers), and the cinema. We had a great breakfast at the coffee shop/cafe downstairs.
I highly recommend. Thanks, Anthony.
-Leah from Minneapolis
Great location. Clean and comfortable. Cozy furnishings. Nice place.

After a small misunderstanding about getting into the rental, the stay went very well. Cleaners weren't done when we arrived and 3:00 p.m. and could not get into unit. Got in touch with Anthony but before he could reply the cleaners opened the door as they were almost done and we were able to get into the unit. The only other thing was the washer was broken so we were unable to start sheets and towels as instructed.
Great spot, super cute and clean! Highly recommend.
Anthony was very communicative. Loved the housekeeper, too! Very kind and helpful! Nice place.
great location and having a quiet coffee shop below it made the trip that much sweeter!

Loved staying here so much. Everything was exactly as described and very comfortable. Host has thought of all of the details and I didn’t lack anything while there. Kitchen is well set up for cooking a nice dinner! The Restaurant downstairs is awesome for breakfast in the mornings. Already planning my trip back!
Anthony’s place was very nice. Comfortable to stay in and walkable to corn palace and eating places.

This place was perfect for our stop in Mitchell for the night. The beds were comfy, the place was was really nicely decorated, and the location was great - right off Main Street so we could walk to supper and explore a little. I’m glad we didn’t need to use the washer because the door was broken and unable to start. Luckily it only impacted our ability to start the bedding in the wash before we left. Overall, we’d stay again!
Great place to stay and very clean.

We enjoyed our stay at this lovely apartment. I was surprised at how spacious it was. Though it is an older apartment, it is well maintained, very clean, and tastefully decorated. I appreciated the host's kind responses to my questions. This is one I can definitely recommend!

Awsome apartment. Very spacious and full of character. Perfect location in town. Great restaurants within walking distance. Very clean and comfortable. Awsome host. Very easy to check in and out. Highly recommend.

The location was convenient for a quick stopover, close to the corn palace, with clear instructions where to move the car overnight. We were a bit startled by a guy who came in and said he was checking on the AC right when we got there one hour after the check in time, but in all fairness the host had tried to contact me half an hour before check in, missed due to being on the road at that time. The dishwasher was still running, so I unloaded the dishes when they finished and reran what was visibly missed by the machine. I was awoken at 4am by what sounded like a critter scampering above or around the apartment and again by the coffee shop music below around 7. Floors weren’t the cleanest but they did match the rustic decor. All in all, a sufficient stopover with the basics.

We loved our stay here! It was clean, comfortable, and so cutely decorated!! The location being above an amazing coffee shop and walkable to many other things was great as well. I know another review said they could hear the coffee shop music but I don’t know if they have changed the volume since but we could not hear it! My only problem is I wish we could have stayed longer as we were just quickly passing through!
Very convenient and accessible

We had a fun time in Mitchell. Had a good dinner, got tattoos, visited the Corn Palace, and walked around and popped in to some of the shops. Einstein’s across the street is a fun and interesting place to visit. Anthony’s place is in a good location and has a good amount of space with all you need.
A great place with cozy vibes!
Awesome spot, easy check in, and easy exit. Thanks Anthony!

This was an awesome place to stay! Not only is it clean and comfortable, but it has a great vibe and feel to it. We loved the location, especially being able to wake up and walk down the stairs to the coffee shop below (which serves an amazing breakfast). Will definitely stay here again when we visit family.
The coffee shop below the apartment opens early and you are awakened by church music starting about 6:30. We are early risers so not a problem for us but if you like sleeping in, could be irritating.
Thanks for the stay!
Anthony’s place was very nice. We would consider staying again.
Very cool space. Very quiet and peaceful
Anthony is a great host. Very welcoming and responsive.
Thanks again Anthony.
Great place to stay and visit the cool shops and the Corn Palace
Very cozy environment on the Main Street in town. Also was pet friendly, which we appreciated.
I loved this place! Will totally be back! Easy in.. easy out! So cozy .. everything you need:) thank you Anthony for a no stress weekend !
Great place - beautifully furnished. Location was very convenient for reaching all downtown locations. All instructions for check-in and parking were clearly communicated.
Great place!

Cute little place right on Main St. Perfect for a small family or 2 couples traveling together. Walkable to nearby shops and restaurants (sits right above a coffee shop so breakfast is convenient!). We liked the decor--lots of antique treasures to check out. The place was clean and seemed to have everything needed (we didn't cook so not entirely sure). We'd stay there again!
As always, Anthony’s place was great! Easy check-in and departure, great location in Mitchell and just a nice quaint place to stay.
Great location and plenty of space!
Excellent location;lots of space
Wonderful place and stay!
Our arrival for one-night stay was delayed by weather conditions and the host was very accommodating and communicative. Will stay again in the future.
highly recommend - great location on Main Street.
great location. you have depot ,Dr lucky, back forty, scoreboard. all within walking distance with good food
We have stayed here before. Comfortable and cute as a button! We love to shop downtown and walk to the theater that is only 1.5 blocks away. Definitely a great place to stay. We will be back!
A little slice of heaven, in the middle of a snowstorm. Anthony’s place was warm and comforting. I would highly recommend it.
great location. great space
Great place!
Great place! Beautifully decorated and super cozy!!
Very cute apartment, with great location!
We really felt at home at this apartment and I felt that the host really cared about our stay. I would highly recommend this property.
Thanks so much

This is our third stay now at Anthony's apartment, so you can tell we find it a very reliable stop on our long road trips. It is clean, comfortable, and very convenient. Check-in and check-out are easy and Anthony responds quickly to messages. Thanks!
We enjoyed our short stay here! It is nicely decorated and had everything we needed. If we ever find ourselves in Mitchell in the future, we would hope to stay here again!
Great place, very comfortable beds with a quirky eclectic decor. Fun old time downtown area.

Anthony was amazing to work with! He was super understanding of mine and my classmate's situation and worked with us every step of the way while we were staying in an unfamiliar city. The apartment is SO cute, super homey, and has everything you can think of needing. I would highly recommend staying here!!

This Airbnb was fantastic for me and my friends. We needed a place to stay for wedding and this was much cheaper than a hotel. It is absolutely beautiful and well kept! Lots of extra blankets, pillows, towels, etc. My only complaint is that it was ready by 3 like it said, so we showed up at 3:20 and it was still being cleaned. I didn’t mind this at all, just a heads up would have been nice! Great experience overall and would stay again!
Amazing place
Great place. Very clean and everything I needed. Fantastic stay in the heart of downtown. Highly recommended!
Best place is downtown Mitchell! Easy walk to many shops and antique stores. The Corn Palace is like right next door.
Great location
Great spot in a convenient location

We loved our stay here in Mitchell! Perfect location, centrally located on the main street in downtown! Right above a wonderful Christian owned and run coffee shop! Easy check in process! Super clean and the CUTEST decor ever!! Anthony was very responsive to our questions and made our stay very comfortable! Selena was very quick to respond and extremely helpful with any requests. Additionally, she anticipated us going to the Corn Palace and checked ahead of time for any events that may hinder our visit to the palace. Very much recommended.
Easy check in and out
Very clean and plenty of space for our group.

The house was easy to find and in a quiet neighborhood. It is an older home that Selena turned into a welcoming respite. Beds were comfortable, particularly the full size bed. This little house is quaint and comfortable feels like home. It has everything you need including baking supplies

Selena is a very responsive gracious host.

We loved staying here & will definitely stay again!

You won’t be disappointed in your stay. The beds were comfy. Close to the corn palace and other things to do. Neighborhood was quite. Definitely will stay again.
Great place

Great place to stay while in Mitchell. Had everything we needed. Be prepared for a tiny bathroom. Only one in there at a time, but that is manageable.

Very close to Main Street restaurants and the Corn Palace, and a great value for the amount of space & having a whole place to yourself! Very cozy and comfy, good amount of space, nice outdoor space as well. Very clean, all the necessities. My only complaint/suggestion is to bring your own toilet paper.
Cozy house, very clean and provides everything you will need.
Selena’s home was perfect for our quick stop on our way through the area. It was fun to walk to the Corn Palace!
It is in a great location for being close to downtown. It was easy to find, clean and had many things that made the stay wonderful.
We greatly enjoyed our stay! It was very clean and comfortable!
Very cute, clean and cozy! Selena had fresh water available, which is an amazing option when visiting a new city. Her home is easy to find and near fun restaurants.

Decent sized single floor home in quiet area. Older house, remodeled and well maintained. We stayed here for just a night and unfortunately got in just in time to go to bed and had to leave in the morning for our event. We definitely missed out on enjoying some of the offers of this house such as the backyard fire pit. The beds were crazy comfortable, probably the best I’ve ever slept in away from home. Selena was great at communicating quickly and answering any questions. I would stay here again!

The house is conveniently located in a quiet street just a few blocks from Main Street/Corn Palace. Check-in/Check-out was very smooth and Selena quickly responded whenever there were any questions. Everything was just as shown in the pictures. The bathroom is a bit on the smaller side, but that was not a problem with only two of us staying there. We would certainly consider staying there again.

The house was nice, but it was warm. there were 2 window air conditioners, however both had a note that stated to not set them below 75 degrees. the twin bed is very loud and squeaks every time you move.

Is good value and very comfortable king sized bed!
Nice little place. Plenty of beds with the pull out couches. Host was communicative and helpful!
Great spot!
House was fine, although a bit cramped if you have a large family.
Conveniently located for the Archaeological Dig and the Corn Palace. Appreciated washer and dryer.
Great little spot, close to main street.
Lovely home! Great way to start off our family vacation.
Great house in a wonderful town. Awesome private backyard area. Really close to everything you need. Great place to stay over on a long trip.

Selena's home was exactly as advertised. It was clean, comfortable, and supplied with the amenities a guest might want. Selena also reached out several times to see if there was anything we needed. The house is within walking distance to the Corn Palace. It was peaceful there and I had my best night's sleep out of my entire trip. I would recommend this house highly.
Great location. Easy parking out front. Walking distance to the Corn Palace. Nice stay for a quick overnight in Mitchell.

Good stay, great communication and ease of check-in. Good parking and easy walk to Corn Palace. Kitchen is well appointed. House is spacious except bathroom which is small and may be more of an issue for larger people. Enjoyed our stay and easy walk to Corn Palace.
Such a nice place. Spacious enough, having everything we need. We really enjoyed the stay.
Great place to stay, communicative and kind host. Recommend!
Great place for the cost and very close to Corn Palace! The host was very nice and quick to respond :)
This cute place was perfect for an overnight on our trip. The boys were happy. We were happy. I'm sorry we didn't make use of the beautiful dining room, table or recipe box.
We love this cozy little get away for our family. Wish we could’ve stayed longer but we were just traveling through on our way to Yellowstone. This house went above expectations with an awesome value

Cute, older remodeled home. It comfortably fit all 7 of us. Home has window AC units in the master bedroom and living room. We put a fan in front of the living room one and it kept our kids cool on the pull out couch’s.
Great stay, real close to the Corn Palace. Would stay again.
This is a beautiful house with lots of special touches that make you feel at home. We enjoyed our brief stay here on our way through South Dakota.
Clean, good location, cozy house.

Cozy place to get some great rest on some comfy beds. Our first main stop along long trip from Washington state to Iowa. Selena was extremely helpful with messaging back and forth to make our stay comfortable and friendly. House is very close to center of Mitchell. Access to house either in front or back of house is very convenient. Would stay there again if available next time!
Wonderful old house! Remodeled. Very comfortable bed!
Had a great stay!
Selena is an amazing hostess! Her house was gorgeous and welcoming and a perfect stay for our family.

Spent one night to break up a long travel from Omaha to Mt. Rushmore. Charming, very clean, well-stocked cottage very close to both the Corn Palace and I-90. Selena's house was a perfect stop on our journey from Michigan to see several National Parks. She was helpful and answered all of the questions I had before our arrival.
We stayed hear 9 days into an 8 week road trip. It is within walking distance from the Corn Palace. Lots of room and a huge washer and dryer. The place has a lot of character which we appreciated.

Thanks, Selena! Super comfortable house and bed and everything. Lots of fun to be had on Main Street one measly block away. Elixir Roasterie was *the* spot for coffee.
Nice little house close to the corn palace. So much better then Staying in a hotel and the kids had room to roam . Great spot for a quick stop on a long road trip
We enjoyed our stay at Selena’s place. Easy check-in, loved the games, and the washer/dryer was a total bonus. Great value.
Very nice home with everything we needed for our night stay in Mitchell. Very clean and comfortable.

Best place I’ve stayed. Hosts are awesome and accommodating

Theodore was a very gracious host! I’m so sorry we didn’t get to meet him and his family. I wish I could just stay there longer. I’d like to walk down the country road. It’s the perfect place to snuggle in and read a book. So peaceful and quiet!!

one of the most relaxing airbnb's I've stayed at. Well stocked kitchen and relaxing place to stay. Would definitely stay again!

Absolutely wonderful place to stay!

Excellent place that worked so perfectly for our large family. Love the character and remodel along with the location. We will be back.

The home was beautifully decorated with comfortable furnishings. We especially enjoyed the sunsets from the screened in porch. We highly recommend it and hope to stay there the next time we are there.

Great place for a family or large group. George was very accommodating. We loved the screened in deck and the great view of the James River.
